title: Circular Design: No More Waste
description: Learn Circular Design: No More Waste in one minute.

hook.text: What if every product was designed to be disassembled, repaired, and recycled? That's circular design.

buildup.text: Linear design goes: extract, make, use, trash. Circular design closes the loop: make, use, remake.

twist.text: Most products today are designed to be impossible to repair. Circularity requires redesigning business models.

climax.text: Circular design isn't just greener â€” it forces designers to think about the entire life of a product.

punchline.text: The best industrial design includes its own end-of-life plan.

quiz.question: What is the core principle of circular design?
options: Design products to be disassembled and remade, not trashed
